Html: Site.css does not give the expected style. I downloaded the MVCMusicStoreAssets.zip and copied the Site.css. However it does not work. It does not show the Logo. It does not show the Home and Store Links on the right hand side top. Has anyone encountered this problem?

It seems that you forgot to copie the image map as well it's in the folder as the Site.css file.

 

If you did, than there's an problem in your code, as a sample I forgot to finish a piece of code which result that the store didn't show the genre list.

 

check your code with the Tutorial a simple typo will cause problems. ;))
Thanks It is working !! You rightly guessed it was a typo error
